The armory provides weapons/items that can be purchased with battle tokens.
Build a command post to generate battle tokens for your team.
Defensive structures like turrets and oil barrels provide defense for your outpost.
Build and upgrade gates to keep attackers out.
The Protection Ward grants additional protection to your outpost.
This storage container allows you to share items with your team.
The final resting place of the Baroness Hain, the frozen ghost of Nauthynos. Killing her grants a powerful buff for your team and freezes the enemy team's score.\nSpawning in {time}
The final resting place of the Baroness Hain, the frozen ghost of Nauthynos. Killing her grants a powerful buff for your team and freezes the enemy team's score.\nALIVE

The final resting place of the Baroness Hain, the frozen ghost of Nauthynos. Killing her grants a powerful buff for your team and freezes the enemy team's score.\nBaroness Hain spawns after 10 minutes and respawns after 10 minutes when killed.
Home to the Alpha Wolf, this den is the primary source of Infused Hide on the island.
A concentrated source for Infused Wood. This grove of Infused Trees is guarded by deadly Dryads.
Guarded by wandering Withered and a large undead orge, this area is the island's only source of Infused Ore.
Surrounded by Corrupted enemies, this portal allows your team to donate Azoth in return for a Corrupted Brute Summoning Stone.
